Dialogue: Sara: Hey, you're up early, you finally haven't missed lunch.
Sara: Relax, don't give me that look. It was just a joke, but they ARE serving that terrible tuna casserole in the cafeteria you seem to like for some reason. It might cheer you up some.
Sara: Speaking of... feeling any better today?
Sara: You know...don't feel bad about that. We all go through tough times... trust me, I know.
Sara: Shit happens. But hey, what can you do? If ever... well, I know I'm not the super emotional type, but if you ever wanna vent a little, maybe join in for a bit of screamo karaoke...
playerOptions: Sorry for dragging you into this...
I'd rather not talk about it...

Dialogue: Sara: Wowww, reaally? You're quick to recover...
Sara: Well, if your miracle cure wears off, you know where to find me.
Sara: ...
Sara: Thought so.
Sara: Hey, don't stress.
Sara: Well, considering it's half passed 1:00, I need to head out. Band's waiting. But I should be back around 7:00, if you're up to hanging out or something.
Sara: See you around.

Sara: By the way, Ren mentioned you got a book of his or something? He wanted me to let you know he wants it back now. Told me he's in the computer lab, you can probably meet him there now, if you want.
Sara: Hmph. Whatever you say, up to you.
Sara: Well, I've got to go. Band practice. But I'll be back around 7:00, probably.
Sara: Enjoy that tuna casserole for me.

Sara: By the way, Ren mentioned you got a book of his or something? He wanted me to let you know he wants it back now. Told me he's in the computer lab, you can probably meet him there now, if you want.
Sara: You sure about that? I'm not convinced...but I guess I can't force it out of you.
Sara: I'm surprised, maybe the promise of tuna casserole was enough to make you feel better...
Sara: Heh.
Sara: But for real, it takes a while to heal from things. Remember that.

Ren: Hey, I was looking for you! You don't have my photography book by any chance, do you?
Ren:...
Ren: Oh thanks! I almost thought you would keep it for yourself!
Ren:...
Ren:Sorry, uh...I wasn't serious... I know you wouldn't do that...
Ren: How've you been by the way?
Ren: Oh, hey! You pull an all-nighter again?
Ren: Ah, sorry, that was rude of me. I just mean...nevermind.
Ren: ...
Ren: Hey, is that my book?
Ren: Oh, hey! Long time no see, you're looking well!
Ren: Well, not that you usually look bad it's just...
Ren: ...
Ren: Hey, is that my book?
Ren: Right? Ha, it's alright, though. I guess we've all gotten more busy. No hard feelings.
Ren:But... I hope the book reminded you of old times! Remember when we would run to the park, and take photos of the most random things and send them in to those magazines?
Ren: ...
Ren: We really thought we were going to become famous, huh?
Ren: Right? Ha, it's alright, though. I guess we've all gotten more busy. No hard feelings.
Ren:But... I hope the book reminded you of old times! Remember when we would run to the park, and take photos of the most random things and send them in to those magazines?
Ren: ...
Ren: We really thought we were going to become famous, huh?
playerOptions: Yeah, guess I just got busy.

Dialogue: Ren: Honestly, me too. I haven't felt like myself in a while with all the projects and school and the Photography Club.
Ren: But you know, I think it's times like these where it's even more important to do things you like, like photography! I hope my book helped jog your memory. I miss doing that together!
Ren: ...
Ren: I really do miss it. What've you been up to?
Ren: Of course! I'm a little bad at giving compliments, but I mean it. I haven't seen you in anything but that blue hoodie for a while.
Ren: What I mean is, uh, We all get beaten down by the college pressure sometimes, especially in art. I mean, we got the pressure of the classes, and then the pressure of no job! Haha!
Ren: Uh,anyway, I'm glad you enjoyed the book, nice to brush up on some photography skills, right?
Ren: Honestly, me neither.
Ren: Stress and school and assignments and the photography club are driving me nuts! I mean, the good kind I guess. It's been a lot of fun, but a lot of work.
Ren:...
Ren: Speaking of, did you manage to get any photos? I know that book used to inspire you a lot.
playerOptions: Sort of... haven't done too much.
Been a while since I held a camera.

Dialogue: Ren: Oof!
Ren: Hey, don't toss it at me, that thing's heavier than it looks!
Maybe...maybe doing something you like will calm you down...
Ren: You alright there?!
Ren:...
Sorry, it's just... you look like you're about to run away.
Ren: If it'll make you feel better... you can borrow my camera
Ren: It's in my locker, sitting at the top.
